Dimensions: Seven parts: Prudence/Pride 23 3/4" x 6' 3" (60.3 x 190.5 cm); Fortitude/Anger 23 3/4" x 6' 8 3/4" (60.3 x 205.1 cm); Faith/Lust 23 3/4 x 47 1/4" (60.3 x 120 cm); Hope/Envy 23 3/4 x 47 1/4" (60.3 x 120 cm); Charity/Sloth 23 3/4" x 7' 10 1/2" (60.3 x 240 cm); Temperance/Gluttony 23 3/4" x 7' 10 1/2" (60.3 x 240 cm); Justice/Avarice 23 3/4 x 60 5/8" (60.3 x 154 cm)
Title: Seven Virtues/Seven Vices
